title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 141.2 - Establishment of IDV parts and DV parts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 141.2 - Establishment of IDV parts and DV parts

State Regulations

Following consultation with and agreement
of the presiding justice of the Judicial Department in which a county is
located, the Chief Administrator, by administrative order, may establish an IDV
part in Supreme Court or a DV part in Supreme Court or County Court in such
county and assign one or more judges or justices to preside
therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
141.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
